ygData.subject: RE: Warriors Rule, all others Drool !!
ygData.msgSnippet: You hit the nail on the head with your Warrior Fight Guide.  The only thing I would add/suggest is how I change my taunt strategy depending on my group
ygData.messageBody:
You hit the nail on the head with your Warrior Fight Guide. The only thing
I would add/suggest is how I change my taunt strategy depending on my group
members. If my Enchanter friend is with me, I pull and everyone assists my
target while the Enchanter AOE Mez's them. Even if others are being
attacked, we DO NOT attack anything but my target. Of course, if the
monsters continue to resist the mez, we heal/or rotate monsters. If the
Enchanter is not along side me, I taunt everything so that all are hitting
me, my party waits til I have my target fully agiatated at me, and only then
assists. All use the /assist key which many modify to /assist Thoren so
that they can skip that whole F1 key.

Nice webpage!

Thoren & Co.
The Norrath Adventuring Co.
The Rathe

-----Original Message-----
From: Patricia Halas [mailto:patty_halas@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 11:19 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com; EQ-Warriors@onelist.com
Subject: [warriors_eq] Warriors Rule, all others Drool !!


From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>

Everquest is the greatest game on the Planet and needs NO changes!

If anyone cares, I have posted a page on how I fight on the web @
http://members.xoom.com/eqdynasty/warrior.html - 'tis only my humble
opinion.

For the Honor and of The Dynasty Guild and Rallos Zek;

Patricia Bryan of Halas
Princess of the Bryan Dynasty
Dynasty Guild Administrative Officer
Barbarian Warrior of the 30th Rank
